titles.title: A resolution commending the National Association for the Advancement of Colored People on the occasion of its 103rd anniversary.

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Unanimous Consent.

term.name: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues

bill.summary: 7/16/2012--Passed Senate without amendment. Recognizes the 103rd anniversary of the founding of the National Association for the Advancement of Colored People (NAACP). Commends the NAACP for its work to ensure the political, educational, social, and economic equality of all people.
